title: Headshot Mania 2 Conference Announcement
summary: Peter Hurley promotes the Headshot Mania 2 conference in Las Vegas, detailing the event's focus on headshot photography, business growth, and community networking, coinciding with his 50th birthday celebration.

steps.action: Announce the event location in Las Vegas and the host's 50th birthday celebration.
Specify the venue (SLS Hotel) and dates (February 19th to 22nd).
Define the target audience as photographers who photograph people or want to start.
Outline the curriculum covering technical skills, marketing, sales, goals, and motivation.
Direct viewers to register at headshotmania.com.

key_takeaways: Headshot Mania 2 is a comprehensive conference for headshot photographers covering both technical and business skills.
The event fosters community support and networking among photographers.
The conference takes place at the SLS Las Vegas from Feb 19-22, 2020.
